data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bracko, Gregor, Lapeva-Gjonova, Albena, Salata, Sebastian, Borowiec, Lech, Polak, Slavko (2019): Aphaenogasterillyrica, a new species from the mountains of the Balkan Peninsula (Hymenoptera, Formicidae). ZooKeys 862: 89-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.862.32946, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.862.32946
